# Utkarsh Education Website - Next.js + Payload CMS

## Project Overview
Modern, high-speed coaching institute website built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Payload CMS.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Payload CMS (for content management)
- React

## Features
- Hero image carousel with CMS management
- Course offerings display
- Modern educational design
- Mobile responsive
- Fast performance

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Project structure created
- [ ] Dependencies installed
- [ ] Payload CMS configured
- [ ] Home page components built
- [ ] Development server running
